com.test.algorithm.runner

Class PostgresJpaConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.test.algorithm.runner.PostgresJpaConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:datasource.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:application.properties")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:datasource.properties")
 @EnableJpaRepositories(basePackages="com.test.algorithm.runner",
                       entityManagerFactoryRef="emf")
 @EnableTransactionManagement
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.test.algorithm.runner")
public class PostgresJpaConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Postgres Sql Configuration where the Database Resides on the cloud

      • jpaVendorAdapter

        @Bean
public org.springframework.orm.jpa.JpaVendorAdapter jpaVendorAdapter()
        Returns the JPA Vendor Adapter. In this context it is Hibernate. The Database is Set to Postgresql

public org.springframework.orm.jpa.LocalContainerEntityManagerFactoryBean localContainerEntityManagerFactoryBean()
